title: Fort Point National Historic Site: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       Open Thursday through Tuesday -10 AM to 5 PM; Closed Wednesday.  Phone Public Information (415) 556-1693 Bookstore (415) 673-5642  Location South anchorage of the Golden Gate Bridge at the end of Marine Drive on the Presidio of San Francisco  Available Facilities A small bookstore is located inside Fort Point. Restrooms are available outside the Fort. They are located approximately 100 yards away from the fort, down the main road on the right side.  Yearly Closures Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year's Day Dog Regulations Dogs are allowed on leash on Fort Point lands but are not allowed inside the historic Fort.
